awards.text: Won 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 3 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: A TV reporter and cameraman are taken hostage on a tugboat while covering a workers strike. The demands of the hostage-takers are to collect all the nuclear detonators in the Charleston, SC area so they may be detonated at sea. They threaten to detonate a nuclear device of their own of their demand isnt met.

title: Special Bulletin
